hero.title: Karriere
hero.description:
Schreiben Sie Ihre Erfolgsgeschichte mit uns!

Werden Sie Teil unseres Teams und begleiten Sie unsere Kunden auf dem Weg zur besten Versicherungslösung. Spannende Herausforderungen, ein unterstützendes Arbeitsumfeld und die Möglichkeit, wirklich etwas zu bewegen, erwarten Sie. Starten Sie jetzt Ihre Karriere!

cta.title: Bereit loszulegen?
cta.description: Kontaktieren Sie uns noch heute, um zu besprechen, wie wir Ihnen bei der Erreichung Ihrer finanziellen Ziele helfen können.

hero.title: About Finoplenia
hero.description: We are a leading financial services provider committed to helping our clients achieve their financial goals through expert advice and innovative solutions.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We maintain the highest standards of integrity in all our business relationships.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for excellence in every service we provide.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously evolve to meet changing financial needs.

customerFocus.title: Customer Focus
customerFocus.description: Our clients' success is at the heart of everything we do.

history.title: Our History
history.description: From our founding to today, we are committed to excellence in financial services.

2010.title: Foundation
2010.description: Finoplenia was founded with the vision of providing comprehensive financial services for private and corporate clients.

2013.title: Digital Transformation
2013.description: Introduction of our digital platform to make financial services more accessible to our clients.

2015.title: International Expansion
2015.description: Extended our services to international markets with a focus on cross-border wealth management.

2018.title: Corporate Advisory Launch
2018.description: Introduction of comprehensive consulting services to support companies on their growth path.

2020.title: Sustainability Focus
2020.description: Integration of ESG principles into our investment strategies and corporate processes.

2023.title: Innovation Hub
2023.description: Establishment of our innovation hub for developing future-oriented financial solutions.

hero.title: Your Financial Future Starts Here
hero.subtitle: Professional financial advisory, insurance solutions, and wealth management for private individuals and corporations.

privateServices.title: Private Services
privateServices.subtitle: Comprehensive financial services tailored to your personal needs.

wealth.title: Wealth Management
wealth.description: Build and protect your wealth with personalized investment strategies.

insurance.title: Insurance Solutions
insurance.description: Comprehensive insurance coverage for all aspects of life.

retirement.title: Retirement Planning
retirement.description: Secure your future with our professional retirement planning services.

tax.title: Tax Advisory
tax.description: Professional tax planning and compliance services for individuals.

tax.title: Corporate Tax Advisory
tax.description: Strategic tax planning and compliance for businesses.

advisory.title: Strategy Consulting
advisory.description: Professional consulting for business growth and transformation.

hero.title: Häufig gestellte Fragen
hero.description: Finden Sie Antworten auf häufige Fragen zu unseren Dienstleistungen und wie wir Ihnen helfen können.

questions.question: What is Finoplenia?
questions.answer: Finoplenia is a leading financial services provider offering comprehensive solutions for private individuals and businesses. We specialize in wealth management, insurance solutions, retirement planning, and corporate advisory services.

questions.question: How can I get started with Finoplenia?
questions.answer: Getting started is easy. You can either contact us directly through our contact form, call us, or visit our office. Our team will guide you through the process and help you find the right solutions for your needs.

questions.question: What areas do you serve?
questions.answer: We primarily serve clients in Switzerland and neighboring European countries. However, we also work with international clients for specific services, subject to local regulations.

questions.question: What types of insurance do you offer?
questions.answer: We offer a wide range of insurance solutions including life insurance, health insurance, property insurance, and liability insurance. Each can be customized to meet your specific needs.

questions.question: Do you provide investment advice?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide comprehensive investment advice tailored to your financial goals, risk tolerance, and time horizon. Our experts can help you build and manage a diversified investment portfolio.

questions.question: What retirement planning services do you offer?
questions.answer: Our retirement planning services include pension analysis, retirement savings strategies, tax-efficient planning, and ongoing portfolio management to help you achieve your retirement goals.

questions.question: What corporate advisory services do you provide?
questions.answer: We offer strategic consulting, tax planning, risk management, and financial advisory services for businesses of all sizes. Our team can help with both day-to-day operations and long-term strategic planning.

questions.question: Can you help with international business operations?
questions.answer: Yes, we assist companies with their international operations, including cross-border transactions, regulatory compliance, and international tax planning.

questions.question: Do you work with startups?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We have specialized services for startups, including financial planning, funding strategy, and growth advisory services.

support.title: Still have questions?
support.description: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Please contact our support team.

hero.title: Datenschutzerklärung
hero.description: Erfahren Sie, wie wir Ihre persönlichen Daten schützen und verarbeiten.

introduction.title: Einführung
introduction.content: Bei Finoplenia nehmen wir Ihre Privatsphäre ernst. Diese Datenschutzerklärung erläutert, wie wir Ihre Informationen sammeln, verwenden, offenlegen und schützen, wenn Sie unsere Website besuchen oder unsere Dienste nutzen. Bitte lesen Sie diese Datenschutzerklärung sorgfältig durch. Wenn Sie mit den Bedingungen dieser Datenschutzerklärung nicht einverstanden sind, greifen Sie bitte nicht auf die Website zu.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us when you:

personal.title: Personal Data
personal.content: While using our service, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you. This may include:

usage.title: Usage Data
usage.content: We may also collect information about how you access and use our website, including:
items: Time and date of your visit

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use the collected data for various purposes:
items: To provide and maintain our service
To notify you about changes to our service
To gather analysis or valuable information
To detect, prevent and address technical issues

sharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
sharing.content: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information with:
items: Service providers who assist in our operations
Professional advisers including lawyers and auditors
Regulatory authorities when required by law

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to maintain the security of your personal information, including:
items: Encryption of data in transit and at rest
Regular staff training on data protection

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: Under applicable data protection laws, you have certain rights regarding your personal data:
items: Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten')

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our service and hold certain information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our service does not address anyone under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from anyone under the age of 18.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'last updated' date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

hero.title: Allgemeine Geschäftsbedingungen
hero.description: Bitte lesen Sie diese Allgemeinen Geschäftsbedingungen sorgfältig durch, bevor Sie unsere Dienste nutzen.

introduction.title: Einführung
introduction.content: Diese Allgemeinen Geschäftsbedingungen legen die Regeln und Vorschriften für die Nutzung der Website und Dienste von Finoplenia fest. Durch den Zugriff auf diese Website gehen wir davon aus, dass Sie diese Geschäftsbedingungen vollständig akzeptieren. Nutzen Sie die Website von Finoplenia nicht weiter, wenn Sie nicht alle auf dieser Seite aufgeführten Geschäftsbedingungen akzeptieren.

definitions.title: Definitions
definitions.content: The following terminology applies to these Terms and Conditions, Privacy Statement and Disclaimer Notice:

items.definition: Refers to you, the person accessing this website and accepting the Company's terms and conditions.

items.term: The Company, Ourselves, We, Our and Us

items.definition: Refers to both the Client and ourselves, or either the Client or ourselves.
Refers to the financial services and products offered by Finoplenia.

services.title: Services
services.content: Finoplenia provides financial services including but not limited to:
services.disclaimer: The services provided by Finoplenia are subject to applicable laws and regulations. We reserve the right to modify or discontinue any service without prior notice.

license.title: License to Use Website
license.content: Unless otherwise stated, Finoplenia and/or its licensors own the intellectual property rights for all material on this website. All intellectual property rights are reserved. You may view and/or print pages from the website for your own personal use subject to restrictions set in these terms and conditions.

restrictions.title: You must not:
items: Sell, rent or sub-license material from this website
Reproduce, duplicate or copy material from this website

userAccounts.title: User Accounts
userAccounts.content: When you create an account with us, you guarantee that:
items: The information you provide is accurate and complete
You will maintain the accuracy of such information
You are legally capable of entering into binding contracts
You are at least 18 years old

liability.title: Disclaimer and Limitation of Liability
liability.content: The information on this website is provided on an 'as is' basis. To the fullest extent permitted by law, Finoplenia:
items: Excludes all representations and warranties relating to this website and its contents
Excludes all liability for damages arising out of or in connection with your use of this website
Is not responsible for any actions taken as a result of your reliance on any information provided on this website

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify and hold Finoplenia harmless from any demands, loss, liability, claims or expenses made against them by any third party due to or arising out of or in connection with your use of the website.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend access to our services immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Terms on this page and updating the 'last updated' date.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.content: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of Switzerland, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us:

hero.title: Unternehmensdienstleistungen
hero.description: Umfassende Finanzlösungen für Unternehmen jeder Größe

sections.title: Beratung
sections.description: Unsere erfahrenen Experten entwickeln maßgeschneiderte Anlagestrategien, die Ihre finanziellen Ziele und Ihre Risikobereitschaft berücksichtigen. Wir bieten aktives Portfoliomanagement und regelmäßige Performanceüberwachung.

sections.title: Steuern
sections.description: Wir erstellen einen umfassenden Finanzplan, der Ihre kurz- und langfristigen Ziele berücksichtigt. Von der Altersvorsorge bis zur Nachlassplanung - wir helfen Ihnen, die richtigen Entscheidungen zu treffen.

services.title: Unsere Private Banking Dienstleistungen
services.description: Umfassende Lösungen für Ihre finanzielle Zukunft

hero.title: Privatkundengeschäft
hero.description: Maßgeschneiderte Finanzlösungen für Ihre persönliche Vermögensverwaltung

sections.title: Versicherung
sections.description: Unsere erfahrenen Experten entwickeln maßgeschneiderte Anlagestrategien, die Ihre finanziellen Ziele und Ihre Risikobereitschaft berücksichtigen. Wir bieten aktives Portfoliomanagement und regelmäßige Performanceüberwachung.

sections.title: Altersvorsorge
sections.description: Wir erstellen einen umfassenden Finanzplan, der Ihre kurz- und langfristigen Ziele berücksichtigt. Von der Altersvorsorge bis zur Nachlassplanung - wir helfen Ihnen, die richtigen Entscheidungen zu treffen.

sections.title: Vermögen
sections.description: Unser Team von Steuerexperten hilft Ihnen, Ihre Steuerlast legal zu optimieren. Wir beraten Sie zu steuereffizienten Anlagestrategien und unterstützen Sie bei der Strukturierung Ihres Vermögens.

sections.title: Immobilien
sections.description: Von der Auswahl der richtigen Immobilie bis zur Finanzierung - wir unterstützen Sie bei allen Aspekten Ihrer Immobilieninvestition. Profitieren Sie von unserer Expertise im Immobilienmarkt.

sections.title: Steuerplanung
sections.description: Wir analysieren Ihren Versicherungsbedarf und entwickeln ein maßgeschneidertes Konzept für Ihre Absicherung. Unser Ziel ist es, Ihnen optimalen Schutz zu bestmöglichen Konditionen zu bieten.

services.title: Unsere Private Banking Dienstleistungen
services.description: Umfassende Lösungen für Ihre finanzielle Zukunft

submenu.name: Altersvorsorge
